Sarada kicks her opponent away, moves herself to where they'll land, and kicks them up in the air. She jumps up above them and proceeds to perform a [[Lion Combo]] on them toward the ground. She proceed to throw a [[Fire Release: Great Fireball Technique|Great Fireball]] and finishing it with a [[Cherry Blossom Impact]] on them.

[[pt-br:Temporal do Esmagamento Celestial]]
